title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that the title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Click on "OK" to close the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected behavior:
The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
